answers.answer: Probably because you ate breakfast. Same thing just happened to me so I'm sitting at the hospital doing my 3hr glucose now :( but haven't eaten anything since 10pm last night. With my first I ate breakfast and lunch before my dr appointment then they sent me straight over for my test without telling me I wasn't supposed to eat
Jessiebaby21 ahh makes me feel a little better. I have my 3 hour in couple hours and haven't ate since last night. I hope your test come back good! (: and Congrats on your baby

My midwife almost did that to me, but luckily I had to go to work so I got to reschedule. Most likely you don't have diabetes, its because of the breakfast. I would of failed mine, too cuz I had oj that morning before my appt. Good luck on the 3 hour! :)
I had breakfast and passed mine. I was told to eat both times before my one hour tests. I just ate an egg sandwich. Every ob has their own instructions, but usually you fast for the three hour test.

A lot of people who don't pass the one hour screening pass the 3 hour screening. It wouldn't have made you fail if you ate breakfast that morning and chewed gum, you probably would have failed anyway so don't worry too much.
Thanks Hun congrats on your lil one also. Hopefully you pass yours also

question: So on Tuesday I had my regular ob appoinment where they weighed me, took blood pressure, and listen to the heartbeat. Then I was told to do my glucose test. They never had told me I was doing it that day. So I had eaten breakfast and also chewed gum during the visit. They called me and told me he results were high, I needed to go for a 3 hour test. My question is by any chance do you ladies think I failed because I had chewed gum before drinking the juice? I'm.so nervous and scared I have diabetes more scared for my baby. Please advice
title: Failed 1 houe glucose test :/
